title: A Vineyard With Wine Production.
text: Business Summary A vineyard with wine production, in the Var Department. The site area is 80 hectares. The vineyards are located on the area of 33 hectares. From grape produces wine of AOC ''Cï¿½tes de Provence''. From the vineyards growing on the area of 27 hectares is the local wine - IGP. Forest occupies about 10 hectares. Commercial buildings: office, wine cellar and a warehouse ( with a capacity of 4 000 HL), a store. Residential accommodation: Bastide, 600 sq. m., Park; house guard. Outbuildings in need of renovation. The most Western part of the Riviera, the var coast, famous for its wines. The hillsides here are covered with vineyards. The coast is very diverse. Here there are sandy beaches, and limestone cliffs. Further from the coast are low hills, among which the lost medieval village. From the tops of the hills offer beautiful views of the sea. The center of this district is a bustling city of Toulon, a major sea port, playing an important role in the life of France in the sixteenth century. The cost of the vineyard - 12 500 000 euros. Documents ready to deal. Additional information is available upon request. Financials Gross Revenues: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow Type: EBITDA
